name: Golden Haven Hot Springs Spa

reviews.title: You have to go!
reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews, I was a bit skeptical...however, this was a great place!!

reviews.title: My Boyfriend's Birthday Surprise
reviews.text: The pros: Friendly staff, quick check-in, was able to book a mud bath at the last minute, we had the cheapest room and it was still large and luxurious - included a mini-fridge, candies, and everything was very clean and new. New flatscreen TV on the wall. For $98 per night, seriously, how can you beat it???

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We did a couples mud bath and it was awesome!!! Lying in the mud was very relaxing and our attendant was very caring and even gave us some extra time in the bath and in the jacuzzi. It's a very romantic experience although the facilities could use a little dressing up - it's a bit hospital-like with the tile and no real decorations. Again, for an hour and 15 min spa treatment for about $50 per person, how can you beat it??

reviews.text: D Kumetat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Given that the prices at the Golden Haven are so much cheaper than everywhere else, I have to admit I was a little wary about what we would find. But honestly, it was exactly what we were looking for and then some. A simple home base from which we could head out in the morning to go exploring wineries all across the Napa and Sonoma Valleys, then roll back to in the evening for a quick dip in the pool, a relaxing soak in the hot tub and a night of quiet slumber in our room. Each day our room was replenished with two FREE water bottles (something hotels 4X the price don't do). There was a small fridge for keeping our cheese and assorted goodies. And the mud bath was the icing on the cake. We liked it so much, we went back for seconds a few days later. Another place around the corner offers similar prices but the rooms did not have private bathrooms, which is why in the end we opted for the Golden Haven and we are forever glad we did. Stay here and spend the money you save eating and drinking at Napa's world class restuarants. You can't go wrong.
reviews.title: The Perfect Home Base
Excellent stay and highly recommended!
reviews.text: We stumbled upon this charming retreat and were thoroughly impressed with everything. A great location close to the action in town, a super charming room and comfortable bed, a great spa (highly recommend the couples mud bath) and a very helpful and friendly staff. We will definitely visit again soon!

I'm 45, going through a divorce after 30 years of marriage & have 2 daughters aged 5 & 3 years. This was the best place for me to be by myself for 3 days during the final stage of my divorce. Not only was my room clean, cozy & comfortable, but the entire staff was very accommodating, friendly and courteous. What a super hideaway it was- hot spring tubs, pool, spa services and a wonderful area to take a walk & feel safe while being alone!
reviews.title: Ultimate Comfort & Relaxation @ Golden Haven

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Town is a short distance away with plenty of shops, as well as wonderful restaurants with just about any kind of food to suit your mood & palate! My favorite was Checkers for a half order each of the greek salad & raviolis, which was just right! I even went wine tasting & received a 10% discount on wines purchased with a special wine tour flyer the Golden Haven provided.
reviews.title: An anniverary to remember!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The housekeeping & office staff even went out of their way to help me get back a personal item I left in my room upon checkout! I highly recommend the Golden Haven Hot Springs Spa to anyone & will be returning myself as soon as possible!!! Maybe even with someone special...

aka: Golden Haven Hot Springs Hotel Calistoga
description: Golden Haven Hot Springs makes the perfect Calistoga spa getaway. Come and experience the magic of the hot springs mineral water and rejuvenating spa treatment, including massage and mud baths for couples. Come for the day or stay for the night in one of our newly remodeled and affordable rooms. Our most popular accommodation is our Jacuzzi room featuring the hot springs mineral water that made Calistoga the #1 spa destination in Napa Valley.
